name: swoony
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
giving someone a lot of pleasure or romantic feelings: Rock Hudson is the swoony romantic lead in this funny film. The song's swoony melodies are difficult to resist.
feeling a lot of pleasure and romantic feelings: When I was a little girl I was swoony over anything to do with brides or weddings.
More examplesFewer examplesHollywood chose Andy Garcia, a dark and swoony Latin lookalike, to portray Modigliani. I loved the swoony scent of the roses. He said the women in the film seemed too emotional and swoony.
